Dialogue.text: If we just hit it one more time, it will be our only chance to flee.
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Oh no! I can't seem to activate it. The automatic trigger is jammed!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Oh no! It's the Kraken! It has caught us!!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: That's why it's not working! We need to break free!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Hey Buddy!! What are you doing?! It is dangerous out there!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally
